The Oblitercons/Unitron/Oinker/Punch/Zergling:




Unitron and Dark One rolled and dived out of the way of the shots, 
flying away from the Ark to regroup.

---

Oinker fired off three laser bolts at a nearly repaired autocannon.

---

Breakdown fired off two grenades, each heading for the newly repaired 
hull plating.

---

Hiss rolled, dodging the optic blasts.  He fired a rocket at the Ark.

--- 

Scavenger drove at the Ark, firing three blasts from his laser cannon.

---

Pyro fired off two fire balls at the Ark.

-------

Zergling and Punch entered the Ark's bridge.

"Zardus will be most please." Zergling said, tossing a charge into 
the middle of the bridge, the two Alliance members leaving as the 
counter went down to five seconds.
